laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukocytosis (41,600/µL), elevated C-reactive protein (CRP) level (13.03 mg/dL)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: White blood cell count improved after treatment

laboratory_examinations.findings: Thrombocytopenia (platelets 30,000/µL), anemia (hemoglobin 8.4 g/dL) with schistocytes, decreased haptoglobin (4.0 mg/dL), hypocomplementemia (C3 19 mg/dL, C4 7 mg/dL, CH50 < 14.0/mL)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Platelet counts began to decrease on Day 8

laboratory_examinations.findings: Prothrombin time (PT)-ratio was 1.60, antithrombin (AT) III was 17%, fibrinogen was less than 35 mg/dL, fibrinogen/fibrin degradation products (FDP) was 44.1 µg/mL, elevated D-dimer was 42.8 µg/mL
No pleocytosis and CSF culture was negative
Bilateral symmetric areas of increased intensity in the basal ganglia on T2 and diffusion-weighted imaging
